title: How to Make Last Minute Brandy Custard

steps.headline: Pour the prepared custard into a large mixing bowl.
Whip 1 cup of cream.
steps.description: The cream is ready when it forms soft peaks.

steps.headline: Fold the whipped cream into the custard.
Cover and place in the refrigerator.
Serve.
steps.description: For added flavor, sprinkle with nutmeg prior to serving. Done––nice and easy!

text: Pour the prepared custard into a large mixing bowl.  Pour in the brandy. Mix through gently. Whip 1 cup of cream. The cream is ready when it forms soft peaks. Fold the whipped cream into the custard.  Cover and place in the refrigerator.  Serve. For added flavor, sprinkle with nutmeg prior to serving. Done––nice and easy!
